item.title: Im not one to ask for spoonfeeding
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

[code]
else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {

try {
String name = command.substring(5); 
        client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
           c.teleportToX = ####; // There you Gonna Respawn X
           c.teleportToY = ####; //  There You  Gonna  Respawn Y
        c.teleblock = false;
           c.sendMessage("You have been released from jail, please be good.");
		   c.frame99(0);
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		sendMessage("Player succesfully unjailed");
					PlayerHandler.messageToAll =("[WARNING] "+command.substring(5)+" Is now on the loose!"); 
	} catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to unjail");
            }

        }

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2008, 03:00:33 pm[/size][hr][code]
if (command.startsWith(“unmute”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = false;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have unmuted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to unmute..");
            }
        }[/code]

item.source: Im not one to ask for spoonfeeding

item.title: Im not one to ask for spoonfeeding
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

But, I am like, really lazy atm lol.

Can anyone whip me up an ::unmute and ::unjail command? Here are current ones.

Jail:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }[/code]

Mute:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

Thanks, I’ll rep you. =]

Read full topic
